Your Journey Reinvented

Abadas that combine style, comfort, and performance.
Elevate your Capoeira game with gear that works as hard as you do.

4-WAY STRETCH

Expands in both directions, ensuring the abadas move with your body, no matter how extreme the movement. It provides comfort that lasts from your first ginga to your last esquiva.

TAPERED FIT

Expands in both directions, ensuring the abadas move with your body, no matter how extreme the movement. It provides comfort that lasts from your first ginga to your last esquiva.

ELASTIC WAISTBAND

Expands in both directions, ensuring the abadas move with your body, no matter how extreme the movement. It provides comfort that lasts from your first ginga to your last esquiva.

ZIPPERED POCKET

Keeps you dry during long training sessions and reduces chaffing and discomfort caused by sweat. Our fabric keeps you feeling fresh, allowing you to focus on you game.

Shop Abadas

Capoeira playbook

This online Capoeira training guide was made using over 20 years of experience, countless books, workshops, and courses. Take charge of your Capoeira training.

Foundations

Foundations covers the understanding of basic movements and basic training concepts. These are supplemented with lessons on anatomy, ecological dynamics and constraints lead learning.

Acceleration

We will focus on building speed, strength, and mobility to enhance our physical foundation. This training will allow us to access and execute challenging movement variations with greater ease and precision.

Improvisation

Capoeira is about improvising movement and expressing yourself in the game. In the final section, we’ll learn how to train in a way that mirrors the dynamic game of Capoeira and to move seamlessly in the roda.

Get guide

The story of Dendê Arts

Chris "Calado" Rodriguez

Capoeira Teacher

I started training in 2007 and fell in love with the super-human movement, the flow, and the excitement of playing in the roda. Although I work as a Web Developer, I've poured countless hours into creating an environment where people who work – like me – can integrate Capoeira into their lives. My goal has always been to grow the capoeira community and improve their experience. That’s why I’ve created a blog, Youtube channel, Instagram account, made several courses, taught in person and manufactured capoeira gear.

Latest from the blog

Don’t miss the number one capoeira blog on the internet. Articles touch on
movement, music, culture, community, education and more.

What people are saying

★ ★ ★ ★ ★

I started my capoeira classes with Calado around 6 months ago, and have had an amazing experience ever since. Each class is designed to cater to the participants, and various capoeira moves are taught with variations for students at different levels. Calado also makes sure to share relevant documents and videos to spread the knowledge about this art, which helps to keep students motivated. In addition, everyone in the class is very friendly and welcoming. I have always recommended this class to my friends, and will continue to do so.

Armin K.

Student

Chris is a great instructor who has a wealth of experience in physical fitness with a constant thirst to learn more and transfer those teachings into class. His teaching skills are showcased by his ability to work with anyone regardless of their physical fitness level and let them have a great workout while enjoying and appreciating Capoeria. With my time attending Chris’s class, I gained a plethora of stretches and exercises that are fun to do at home. Definitely worth checking out if your in the mood to have a fun and diverse workout!
